questions.question: Imagine your life in 10 years time. What will it look like?

answers.answer: In teen years, i want to be a good job. A normal life with a wife and kids.

I want to be happy it's more important in a life. I want to make more money than now with my student job. I hope make a world tour. And i want two kids a girl and a boy. I thing, i having two dogs or three.
